Mari El is notable for being one of the  last strongholds of organized paganism in

Kozmodemyansk, Volzhsk, Yurino, Zvenigovo are all reachable by boat on the Volga River. Otherwise, it is easiest to arrive through the capital and regional road hub of Yoshkar-Ola via rail from the railway junction at Zelenodolsk (Zeleny Dol),
. An overnight daily train runs from
's Kazan railway station to Yoshkar-Ola, which takes about 14.5 hours.
